title: Satya Nadella
Born: Satya Narayana Nadella ,  (1967-08-19) 19 August 1967 (age 52) , Hyderabad, Telangana, India
Education: The Hyderabad Public School, Begumpet , Manipal Institute of Technology , Manipal Academy of Higher Education , University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee , University of Chicago Booth School of Business
